The iteration will be repeated N times. The active count is available with the function times_index(K) where K is in the range [0 - number of times iterations used].
Returns the iteration group N steps above the current group.
Frequency and period iterator. Each partition represents a period with chains having a specific frequency. No periods overlap.
Frequency and period iterator. Each partition represents a period with legs having a specific frequency. No periods overlap.

ROUTE INSTRUCTION: Use route instructon constraint
ROUTE INSTRUCTION: If 0, activity must be completely inside the RI period; if 1, activity must begin inside the period.
BUDDY BID: Use buddy bid constraint
